name: Indian Institute of Science
overview: India's premier institute for advanced scientific research and education. It is an Institute of Eminent Status and consistently ranked as the top university in India.

name: Indian Institute of Management Bangalore
overview: An Institute of National Importance and one of the leading graduate schools of management in Asia.

name: National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal
overview: One of the top NITs in India, located on the coast of the Arabian Sea. It is an Institute of National Importance known for its strong engineering programs.
tuition: â‚¹1,25,000 per semester (Income based waivers apply)

name: Indian Institute of Technology Dharwad
overview: A third-generation IIT established in 2016, rapidly growing its infrastructure and research capabilities in Northern Karnataka.

name: National Law School of India University
overview: The first National Law University in India and consistently ranked as the best law school in the country.

name: International Institute of Information Technology Bangalore
overview: A premier deemed university focusing on IT and research. It offers high-end M.Tech and Integrated M.Tech programs.

name: Manipal Academy of Higher Education
overview: An Institute of Eminence (IoE) and a pioneering private deemed university. It houses Kasturba Medical College (KMC) and Manipal Institute of Technology (MIT).

name: Visvesvaraya Technological University
overview: One of the largest technological universities in India. It affiliates nearly all engineering colleges in Karnataka.

name: Rashtreeya Vidyalaya College of Engineering
overview: Karnataka's most prestigious self-financing engineering college, affiliated with VTU but enjoying autonomous status.

name: B.M.S. College of Engineering
overview: India's first private engineering college, established in 1946. It is an autonomous institute affiliated with VTU.

name: M.S. Ramaiah Institute of Technology
overview: A renowned autonomous engineering college affiliated with VTU, located in the educational hub of Mathikere.

name: Bangalore University
overview: One of the oldest universities in India, located at the Jnana Bharathi campus. It affiliates many arts, science, and commerce colleges in Bengaluru.

name: University of Mysore
overview: The first university in Karnataka and the sixth oldest in India. Known for its heritage Manasagangothri campus.

name: Karnatak University
overview: A major state university serving the North Karnataka region, offering a wide range of programs.

name: Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences
overview: The affiliating university for medical, dental, ayurveda, homeopathy, nursing, and pharmacy colleges in Karnataka.

name: Bangalore Medical College and Research Institute
overview: The top government medical college in Karnataka, affiliated to RGUHS. It is associated with Victoria, Vani Vilas, Minto, and Bowring hospitals.

name: St. John's Medical College
overview: A premier private catholic medical college consistently ranked among the top medical institutes in India.

name: Christ (Deemed to be University)
overview: A major multi-disciplinary deemed university known for its strict discipline, vibrant campus life, and strong management/law/arts programs.

name: PES University
overview: Formerly PESIT, now a private university. It is one of the most sought-after tech universities in Bangalore for CSE.

name: Jain (Deemed to be University)
overview: A deemed university promoted by the Jain Group, known for entrepreneurship, sports, and management studies.

name: REVA University
overview: A large private university near Yelahanka known for its eco-friendly campus and diverse course offerings.

name: University of Agricultural Sciences, Bangalore
overview: One of the premier agricultural universities in India, located at the Gandhi Krishi Vignana Kendra (GKVK) campus.

name: Central University of Karnataka
overview: Established to address regional imbalances in higher education, CUK offers integrated and postgraduate programs.

name: Karnataka State Law University
overview: The single affiliating university for all law colleges in Karnataka (except NLSIU).

name: JSS Academy of Higher Education and Research
overview: A deemed university focused on medical and health sciences, including JSS Medical College and JSS College of Pharmacy.

name: KLE Technological University
overview: Formerly BVBCET, this is now a private university known for its strong emphasis on engineering education and entrepreneurship in North Karnataka.

name: Siddaganga Institute of Technology
overview: One of the premier autonomous engineering colleges affiliated to VTU, run by the Sri Siddaganga Education Society.

name: National Institute of Fashion Technology Bengaluru
overview: A premier institute for fashion design, technology, and management, set up under the Ministry of Textiles.

name: University Visvesvaraya College of Engineering
overview: Established in 1917 by Sir M. Visvesvaraya, it is one of the oldest engineering colleges in India, recently granted autonomous university status (UVCE University).

name: Mount Carmel College
overview: A premier women's college (now autonomous) affiliated with Bengaluru City University, known for its liberal arts and science programs.

name: St. Joseph's University
overview: Formerly St. Joseph's College (Autonomous), it was upgraded to a university under RUSA. Known for humanities and sciences.

name: Symbiosis International University, Bengaluru
overview: Bengaluru campus of Symbiosis International (Deemed University), housing SCMS and SIBM Bengaluru campuses.

name: National Institute of Technology Karnataka (NITK), Surathkal
overview: One of the top NITs in India, located on the NH66 with a private beach. Known for placement records.

name: RV College of Engineering (RVCE)
overview: Karnataka's top private engineering college, famous for its rigorous academics and 100% placement record.

name: Bangalore Institute of Technology
overview: Located in the heart of Bangalore, BIT is known for its consistent performance and central location.

name: Nitte Meenakshi Institute of Technology
overview: A rapidly growing autonomous institute with modern infrastructure and decent placement records.

name: Sir M. Visvesvaraya Institute of Technology
overview: Named after the legendary Sir MV, this college is known for its lush green campus and strict academic discipline.
